summary: The richest people on Earth should pay more than $0 in federal income taxes . The American people deserve answers .
Bernard Sanders (Independent-VT) said: The reality of today is that poverty is a death sentence in America . The wealthiest people live, on average, 10-15 years longer than the poorest .
Kevin McCarthy (Republican-CA) said: As #YomKippur begins, I join the Jewish people in praying for peace . May all those observing have an easy and meaningful fast .

Eric Swalwell (Democrat-CA) said: The Trump Tax Scam was a giveaway to the ultra-rich and biggest corporations . It's long past time that they pay their fair share to raise up our nation . Elizabeth Warren said: Republicans added trillions to the deficit under President Trump, but now they're refusing to raise the debt ceiling to pay their bills .

Marjorie Taylor Greene (Republican-GA) said: BUILD THE WALL!Bernard Sanders said: In the fight against climate change, we have a choice: protect the profits of the fossil fuel industry or protect the future of our children . Sheldon Whitehouse (Democrat-RI) called ours a carbon pollution fee because that’s what it is and polluters should pay it .

John Cornyn (Republican-TX) said: I agree with @GovAbbott : The Biden Administration is in complete disarray and is handling the border crisis as badly as the evacuation from Afghanistan . Matthew M. Rosendale said: Following the Biden Administration’s disastrously mismanaged withdrawal from Afghanistan, I warned that we could not use this Administration's incompetence to justify flooding our communities .

Bernard Sanders (Independent-VT) said: We must end a rigged system that allowed the former CEO of Gilead to become a billionaire by charging $1,000 for a Hepatitis C drug that was developed by the VA, costs $1 to manufacture & can be purchased in India for $4 .

10,503 illegal aliens are under the Del Rio International Bridge as of this morning, Ted Cruz (Republican-TX) said: Everyone under the bridge is there because of Joe Biden’s disastrous policies. #BidenBorderCrisis is not seasonal. It is essential that we secure our border as the Taliban grows in power.

Nancy Pelosi (Democrat-CA) said: Join me at the @CambridgeUnion for a moderated conversation and acceptance of an honorary membership . Matthew M. Rosendale (Republican-MT) said that America is being invaded. Jim Jordan said: breitbart.com/clips/2021/09/09 .

Sheldon Whitehouse (Democrat-RI) said: Congratulations to @EnergyRI! Refrigeration is a top consumer of electricity for grocery stores . Small businesses are the heart of our communities. That is the true American Spirit!

Val Butler Demings (Democrat-FL) said: The bravery of our athletes yesterday was heartbreaking, because it showed how far we still have to go to protect women and girls in this country . Pramila Jayapal said: RT if you agree: it's time to pass the Women’s Health Protection Act and guarantee abortion as a right . Lauren Boebert said: Big tech is censoring my abortion video .

Democrats defend Biden for pushing a foreign leader to lie, but they impeached Trump for pushing the truth . Sheldon Whitehouse (Democrat-RI) said: My DISCLOSE Act would expose the corrupt system that drowns out Americans’ voices .

Bernard Sanders (Independent-VT) said: Why do we pay, by far, the highest prices in the world for prescription drugs? The pharmaceutical industry has spent $4.5 billion over the last 20 years in lobbying and campaign contributions .

Tim Scott (Republican-SC) said: As inflation rises, we are seeing the real wages of hardworking American families diminish . Ayanna Pressley said: Expanded unemployment benefits have been a lifeline for the millions struggling to make ends meet throughout this public health & economic crisis .

Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez (Democrat-NY) said: We're hiring! We're looking for a Field Representative for the Queens neighborhoods in NY-14. This role is on the front lines, helping constituents get the resources they need - navigating immigration processes, accessing FEMA disaster relief and more .

Matt Gaetz (Republican-FL) said: Did Nancy Pelosi ask General Milley to take an action outside of his chain of command? Republican-Tennessee Rep. Marsha Blackburn said: Does Joe Biden think the Chinese Communist Party is an ally?

Marcy Kaptur announced $5.9 million in federal funding for @LucasHousing and @NatlChurchRes to help create 30 affordable housing units for our low-income seniors in Toledo .
